programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A typical heartbreaker and playboy wakes up to find out that his manhood has disappeared. He consults a prophet and finds out the curse has been put on him by one of the women he has angered and he has 24 hours to seek forgiveness from the one who has cursed him. The problem is, he doesn't know who the culprit is amongst all the women he has angered.

programme.title: Blood & Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: The Governor's Daughter
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A high-flying woman, Mrs. Helen Onoja, is fixated on making sure her only son, Felix, not only marries from a class as high as hers, but specifically a governor’s daughter. She goes all out to arrange for him to date the spoilt daughter of her childhood friend, whose father happens to be the incumbent governor of Kogi State, ignoring the fact that Felix is in love with another woman, Abike. Meanwhile Felix’s relationship with Abike suffers because he is unable to stand up to his domineering mother.

programme.title: Lama
programme.desc: When a doctor meets a patient with mysterious injuries, he suspects she is a victim of domestic abuse and asks the police to investigate putting her in even more danger.

programme.title: Lurk
programme.desc: A woman dedicated to her work is unaware that she has made enemies who would stop at nothing to see her dead.

programme.title: Fall Guy
programme.desc: Sammy and Austin are childhood friends who have always had each other’s backs right from their teenage years. Their friendship is made in heaven and they will sacrifice almost anything for each other in business, money and women, especially Women.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always feel left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is important.

programme.title: Excuse Me
programme.desc: The life of a successful journalist gets complicated when her love life is entangled in a news story that can make or break her career.

programme.title: Flee
programme.desc: A man sees his faith challenged when his integrity compromised by a young woman who is relentlessly after him for marriage.

programme.title: Freda
programme.desc: Tobi is completely in love with his fiercely very rich and successful girlfriend, Freda. He does everything to make her happy but she doesn't seem satisfied with anything he does. When she says yes after his public marriage proposal, he believes everything in their life is perfect, but things start to spiral out of control.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge Season 6 - Adam Srae
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: Killing Daisy
programme.desc: Gerald wakes up every morning with a note to 'Kill Daisy' but with no previous memories of his life, he is unsure of what it all means.

programme.title: The Missing Chief Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Detective Lazarus battles life and work as he solves various crime puzzles - from a missing will tearing a family apart, an important package setting him on a wild goose chase, a missing chief bridesmaid days before a wedding and an expensive heirloom. But each case has twists and turns and shows not all is what it seems.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: Motives
programme.desc: After abandoning her baby at a hospital with a hole in his heart, the estranged mother comes back for him when he's been adopted by an ICU nurse. A child tussle emanates when the love of motherhood comes as a realisation between the two women, the biological mum and a caretaker mum.
